feed.title: Combined summary - Decreasing block propagation time

entry.title: Combined summary - Decreasing block propagation time
entry.summary: On the Bitcoin-development mailing list, a user named Rebroad inquired about the implementation of an idea proposed in an article found on the Bitcointalk forum. The author called the idea excellent but was curious to know what was holding it up from being implemented and if someone needed to code it or write a BIP first. Another user named Matt responded, saying that the idea was already a variation of one discussed on the Bitcointalk forum before, but provided no further information or links regarding this previous discussion. The email ended with an advertisement for EventLog Analyzer, a tool that helps achieve PCI DSS 3.0 compliance.
